name: Dam It! (Finlay)
description:
Work as a dam manager in this turn based light strategy game.

  • Respond to mail.
  • Set how much power to create.
  • Upgrade the Dam

Run the game in fullscreen mode otherwise certain elements will not be visible.  

You can play the game with just a mouse. 

  • Left Click on menus and items to interact
  • Right Click to change the camera view

If you have a keyboard, you can use:

  • Space / W / S to change the camera view
  • Tab / E / I to open the upgrades window
  • A / D or Arrow Left / Arrow Right to change flow rates.

The game was developed over 8 days for the Episode 2 2021 Game Jam, which was organised by the Indie Game Squad. The theme of the jam was 'The Water is Rising'.
